comments.comment: Can you upload the code and the error as well?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Aditya715>@Aditya715</denchmark-link>
Can you upload the code and the error as well?
It was an installation error caused by six. After reinstalling six(sudo pip3 install --ignore-installed six), the issue has been resolved. Thanks for your interest in resolving this issue.
